patthana22.26:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.26:1.1_1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.26:1.1_2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.26:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.26:2.1_1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
